[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Instructions:[/size][/font]

[b][font=Georgia][size=3]1. Copy/paste everything in the file into your Skyrim main folder

2. Copy/paste the "d3d9.dll" and the "enbhost" file from the wrapper version of the lastest ENB binaries by Bor3.
Enjoy!![/size][/font]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/sOwZRV0.jpg[/img][/b]

[b][size=3]Requirements:[/size]

[/b]Enhanced Lights and FX - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?[/url]

To achieve the results from the screenshots; used only:

[b]1.THE CORE FILES IN THE ENHANCED LIGHTS AND FX
2. ELFX EXTERIORS only

[size=4]Highly recommended but optional:[/size]

Climates of Tamriel - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?[/url]

[youtube]Gb7No0RehoI[/youtube]


STAY TUNE ; IM CURRENTLY TESTING THE "VANILLE REALISM ENB". A realistic version of this enb, please watch the video below and let me know if you like it in the comments on youtube. Im still tweaking it though

[/b]
